application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details pursuant to the discharge of Condition 4 (Materials) of planning permission ref. 35924/APP/2023/1358, dated 01-08-2023 (Demolition of an existing garage. Erection of a two storey, 1-bed end-of terrace dwelling and erection of two storey rear extension.)
decision_conditions: The roof tiles used in the construction of the development, by reason of their colour and appearance, are incongruous with and fail to respect the character and appearance of the original building and the street scene of Aylsham Drive, contrary to Policy DMHB 11 of the Hillingdon Local Plan Part 2 (2020), Policy D3 of the London Plan (2021) and Chapter 12 of the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
